new-dao-form.heading: New DAO
new-dao-form.description: To launch a new DAO, create a dedicated smart contract for your organization using the form below.
new-dao-form.external-nft-mint-cta: If you do not have an NFT contract, you can create one using the
new-dao-form.connect-wallet-to-deploy: To deploy a new contract, you first need to connect a wallet.
new-dao-form.wallet-deployment-info: The contract will be deployed via a connected wallet. Please make sure that your selected wallet and chain are correct.
new-dao-form.contract-deployment-in-progress: Contract deployment is in progress. Please don't close the tab browser.
new-dao-form.successful-deployment: Your DAO smart contract has been deployed successfully!

dao-details.you-need-to-have-organization-nfts: You need to have an NFT from the organization's official collection to vote
